source: have your cake and eat it
lemma: have your cake and eat it
definitions: To have or do two good things at the same time that are usually considered to be impossible to have or do at the same time.
To enjoy the advantages of two conflicting things.
To want more than your fair share or to want everything without making choices or sacrifices.
examples: You can't have your cake and eat it too; you need to choose between the two options.
She wants to work full-time and travel the world, but she can't have her cake and eat it.
He tried to have his cake and eat it by investing in risky stocks while expecting guaranteed returns.
